verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: hailed] [ARG1: the nation 's strong job market] [ARGM-TMP: during his first year in office] , [ARGM-ADV: taking credit at the State of the Union for economic gains] .
[ARG0: President Trump] hailed the nation 's strong job market during his first year in office , [V: taking] [ARG1: credit] [ARGM-LOC: at the State of the Union] [ARGM-CAU: for economic gains] .
